Text:
The video is really good quality for 480p, no pixelation @ 40" lcd

The 6channel audio is messed up. DD out was not encoded properly and sound disappears and appears every few seconds. Cant hear even a single dialogue properly .
Audio is perfectly fine after switching to PCM and good quality. Only DD failed.

A8
V9
